'''Halloween Cosplay''', also known as '''''Minecraft'' x ''Disguise'' Halloween Cosplay Skin Pack''', is a [[skin pack]] that includes 10 Halloween costume-themed skins promoting the collaboration between ''Minecraft'' and costume brand ''[https://disguise.com/ Disguise]''. It is available through a promo code obtained by purchasing a product from the "Minecraft Halloween" collection at ''Walmart'' before November 1, 2024.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.walmart.com/browse/minecraft-halloween-dlc/0/0/?_refineresult=true&_be_shelf_id=9764393&search_sort=100&facet=shelf_id:9764393&povid=ETS_minecraft_pov_halloween|title=Minecraft Halloween DLC|website=Walmart.com}}</ref> The promo codes were redeemable until April 30, 2025.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.walmart.com/cp/minecraft-promo/1685719|title=Minecraft Promo|website=Walmart.com}}</ref>
